text: Big Trouble in Little China is a 1986 American action fantasy comedy movie directed by John Carpenter and stars Kurt Russell, Kim Cattrall, James Hong, and Dennis Dun. It was written by W.D. Richter and was a commercial failure upon release and since has become a cult classic. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Big Trouble in Little China at John Carpenter's official website * The Wing Kong Exchange discussion of film influence. * Erasing Clouds retrospective article Category:1986 action movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 fantasy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:Trucker movies Category:Cult movies
title: Big Trouble in Little China
